title: God-King skins
body: I don't know if anyone has posted about this yet but I just wanted to say these skins are amazing, especially the voice lines. The thread itself is meant to say well done to the voice actors and Riot. The voices feel believable IMO, more so on God-Kind Garen, his judgement for example has a line where he yells 'UnBelievers', you can feel the hate in the voice. Thats my opinion anyway but again, amazing job on the skins Design team.m{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: Thanks! I'm really glad you dig the voice lines. Those scripts were a really interesting challenge to write, and I'm happy they came out so well.

> [{quoted}](name=Carnival Knights,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=JNLTIO9z,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2018-07-24T17:59:17.377+0000)
>
> Thanks! I'm really glad you dig the voice lines. Those scripts were a really interesting challenge to write, and I'm happy they came out so well.

I love how you guys really step it up for the VS events. Dawnbringer Riven and Nightbringer Yasuo was also great stuff.

I honestly can't wait to see what you come up with next.

Thanks to God King Garen I had the funniest Tom&Jerry chasing game lately. 

{{champion:150}} (while running and jumping away): DEMAGLIO! 
{{champion:86}} (spinning furiously in pursuit): Demaglio? Demaglio?! How DARE you slander our glorious kingdom!
The skins are good because for two reasons... the lion and the doge

Garen has the better skin of the two.

Both are great though.
